Equator Network

20 September, 2011

The EQUATOR Network is an international initiative that seeks to improve reliability and value of medical research literature by promoting transparent and accurate reporting of research studies.

This site was created in 2007 and is fairly comprehensive, including a news section and eCommunity. It contains a ton of good information on things such resources for better reporting, latest events listings and information on current and completed research projects. In 2010 a Spanish translation of the site was also published.

Launch date: 21st October 2007

  • Equator Network
  • Spanish version of the site
